Package com.RoguePanda.ZAG

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AI
    This is the base class for all AI that entities can have
    AIAttackPlayerMelee
    This handles the close range attack functions for attacks against the player
    AIChasePlayer
    This handles the chase methods for entities following the Player
    AIDeathAnimation
    This handles the death animation for a specified Entity
    AIDroppedItem
    This handles the actions for DroppedItems, such as detecting if the player should pick it up
    AIObject
    This handles the code for GameObjects, such as animations and particles
    AIProjectile
    This handles the attack and despawn for a specified Projectile
    AIShootProjectileAtPlayer
    Handles the code to generate a projectile and set it to shoot at the player
    AITasks
    The list of tasks for a specified Entity to preform
    AIWander
    This handles the code to make an Entity wander
    BasicZombie
    A basic Zombie, has a melee attack and wanders
    Block
    This is a level in game, it hold lists for entities and buildings
    Damaging
    This handles the special closeAttack methods
    DroppedItem
    The object to represent an item dropped from an inventory
    Entity
    A basic Entity, from which all other painted items extend, other than buildings and items
    FireZombie
    A zombie that can shoot fireballs
    GameCanvas
    The object that everything is painted to
    GameObject
    An object, like a tv or a fountain
    gameUpdates
    This manages the game update loop using the specified target FPS
    Inventory
    The object that holds the ItemStacks in possession of a specified Entity
    ItemStack  
    NewJFrame  
    Player  
    Projectile
    This is a simple projectile with no gravity applied to it
    ZAG
